page.title: 05HOLSWORTHY SQUARE
page.content: 'The Square' is the most important single feature of Holsworthy town.It is the main focal point of the town.All of Holsworthy's oldest buildings,shops,markets & routeways are found at the square.The square is the obvious centre of activities in the area and Holsworthy as a town originates from this point.The buildings found at the square originate from the early 19th century. Supermarkets,food shops,hardware stores,banks,chemists,building societies,post offices,restauraunts & public houses can be found in the square.On Wednesdays the square is the location of the weekly pannier market. Other local events such as the St.Peters fair are based at the square. A questionare showed that the local people visit the square at least twice weekly for necessary shopping.
